#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
map < int,bool > visited;
int main()
{
    int n,m; cin >> n >> m;
    if(m!=n-1)
    {
        cout << "NO"; return 0;
    }
    for(int i=0;i<m;i++)
    {
        int x,y; cin >> x >> y;
        if(visited[x]&&visited[y])
        {
            cout << "NO"; return 0;
        }
        else
        {
            visited[x]=visited[y]=1;
        }
    }
    cout << "YES";
    return 0;
}
